question.en-US: What is the position of the nearest sports ball relative to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的运动用球的位置是什么？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅運動波嘅位置係乜嘢？

question.en-US: In which direction is the backpack from my current position?
question.zh-CN: 背包在我当前位置的什么方向?
question.zh-HK: 背囊由我而家嘅位置喺邊個方向？

question.en-US: Can you direct me to the location of the chair?
question.zh-CN: 你能把我引向椅子的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能把我引向椅子的位置嗎？

question.en-US: Could you point out the location of the couch to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能给我指出沙发的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以畀我指出梳化嘅位置啊？

question.en-US: Could you show me where the tv is?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我电视在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我電視喺邊度啊？

question.en-US: Can you please locate the sports ball?
question.zh-CN: 你能找到运动用球吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以搵到運動波啊？

question.en-US: Can you guide me to where the chair is located?
question.zh-CN: 你能引导我到椅子的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能引導我到椅子的位置嗎？

question.en-US: Is the suitcase visible in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 行李箱在场景中是否可见？
question.zh-HK: 行李箱在場景中是否可見？

question.en-US: Can you tell me the location of the closest dining table to me?

question.zh-CN: 你能帮我找到沙发的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以帮我搵到梳化的位置吗？

question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以畀我指出梳化嘅位置啊？

question.en-US: Which way should I look to find the tv from here?
